mapper.select: SELECT g.group_no, CASE WHEN gm.user_no IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS is_member, gj.status AS join_status FROM p_group g LEFT JOIN p_group_member gm ON g.group_no = gm.group_no AND gm.user_no=#{user_no} LEFT JOIN p_group_joinrequests gj ON g.group_no = gj.group_no AND gj.user_no=#{user_no}
